channel.title: Blogs on Deluvi's website
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Deluvi's website

item.title: Hello World! ðŸŽ‰
item.description: Hello people! This is Deluvi speaking. Welcome to my first blog post! I have been inspired by the Indieweb movement to make my own website. I really like their ideas of owning our own data and content and not letting companies owning them for convenience’s sake, since it can be as simple to share on our own website with the help of modern tooling. In this first blog post, I will share my current setup of this static website.
